name: reperf

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, crest, cr), cperf)
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs0)), cr))
-| wss(cr, cc)
-| diffss(hs1, hs0)
-| diffsc(hs1, c0)
-| diffsc(hs1, cr)
-| diffsc(hs0, cr)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[|`t]ℝ)∈ Perf
⊣ c0 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
⊣ ((hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)→(hs1[+]hs0)∈ ℝ)
⊣ ℝ ⊆ ℂ
⊣ d(hs1, hs0)
⊣ d(hs1, c0)
⊣ d(hs1, ℝ)
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ)

-| wss(cr, cc)

-| diffsc(hs1, c0)
-| diffsc(hs1, cr)
-| diffsc(hs0, cr)
